objects.name: Hacking Hardware
objects.description: An adversary exploits a weakness in access control to gain access to currently installed hardware and precedes to implement changes or secretly replace a hardware component which undermines the system's integrity for the purpose of carrying out an attack.
x_capec_example_instances: <xhtml:div style="color:#32498D; font-weight:bold;">A malicious subcontractor or subcontractor's employee that is responsible for system maintenance secretly replaces a hard drive with one containing malicious code that will allow for backdoor access once deployed.</xhtml:div>
